Creating the future of passwordless identity

Our company

We are a passionate team with a big ambition to build passwordless identity for people to identify themselves online.

Digital identity is more important then ever, as it serves as a foundational block to form relationships with your customers. But password challenges, sign up friction, and privacy compromises make it hard for everyone of us to enjoy online digital identity experience.

That is why in 2020 we founded idemeum with a mission to make digital identity simple, secure, and private. We build first Passwordless and Private digital identity platform for developers to implement passwordless technology and delight users with frictionless experience.

Our team

Hustler Nikolay

Product and engineering experience at Facebook, VMware, Cisco. Cyber security and Digital Identity focus.

Builder RJ

Years of experience building global scalable SaaS solutions for millions of users.

Architect Ashk

All things code, design, and making things work smoothly. Have been doing engineering for a while.
